title: More Everything
description:
Swagu and Perk discuss Perk's back and forth with Jayson Tatum on Twitter and how he wants Tatum and Jaylen Brown to thrive together, whether or not Steve Nash is the right coach to lead the Nets to a championship, the amazing story of Stetson Bennett, an emotion they noticed from Nick Saban, and the distinct feelings they had after winning championships. Let's get it!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Marcus Spears, Kendrick Perkins
